text: Rufino Vicente "Bixente" Serrano Izco (22 January 1948 - 4 June 2020) was a Spanish historian and politician. He was born in Navarre, Spain. He was a Deputy in the Cortes Generales from 8 June 2015 to 27 October 2015. He was a member of the Geroa Bai. In 1974, he was put in a political prisoner during the Francisco Franco dictatorship. He was freed in 1977 after an amnesty law was signed. Serrano Izko died on 4 June 2020 from surgical-related problems at a hospital in Pamplona, Spain at the age of 72.Muere en Pamplona el pol√≠tico e historiador Bixente Serrano Izko ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish historians
